house_listing.house_description: This 1 level single family home built in 1992 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 3 car garage and approximately 2835 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Premier Realty RE/MAX Premier Realty

residential_listing_-_basic_features.location: 12320 E Avenida De La Vista Verde
